### 🗒️Notes: 
 - **If the UI is too big**, you can reduce it from **Settings → Appearance → Display Scale**. 
 - **If there are too many ads**, you can change the frequency from **Settings → Support → Ads**. 

## v2.0.9 
 ## Fixed 
 - Incorrect data persists when searching in or switching between anime/manga lists. 

## v2.0.8 
 ## Added 
 - Added option to open a random entry from your media list. 
 - Added compare with your media list using another user's list. 

## Fixed 
 - Fixed issue where manga volumes wouldn't display correctly beyond volume 10. 

## v2.0.7 
 ### Added 
 - Added Polish language by paplyke 

### Fixed 
 - Fix crash when saving searched history 

## v2.0.6 
 ### Added 
 - Add old style color picker [#101](https://github.com/AniLibApp/AniLib/issues/101) 
 - Added a one-time purchase to remove ads and support the app — thank you for your support! 💖 

### Fixed 
 - Improved text compatibility with system font size settings for better readability across all devices. 
 - Fix error when browsing media overview after logout. 
 - Add worker for Airing Schedule Widget and store it in data store. 

## v2.0.3 
 ### Added 
 - Add scroll-to-top functionality from home screen's bottom navigation bar. 
 - Add grid compact in media list display mode (previously known as Classic Mode) 
 - Add different widget appearance settings in widget settings. 
 - Add missing filter in media list filter bottomsheet 
 - Add refresh genre and tags button to sync with anilist inside filter setting 

### Fixed 
 - Fix start and end dates not automatically added on watching and completing list. 
 - Increasing progress will now stop resetting status and other fields. 
 - Fix bug in title comparison caused by inconsistent casing 

## v2.0.2 

### Added 
 - Added filter settings 
 - Exclude tags and genre for anime and manga separately. Manually adjustment to this filter in search will stop adding default filters for anime and manga separately. 
 - Excluded filter will be added when reloading previous filter 
 - Add Doujin, On-List, etc filter on search filter 
 - Show episodes and chapters in almost all cards 
 - Add genre and tags filter in explore and season 
 - Update some themes in filters 

### Fixed 
 - Replaced library with a activity for splash screen implementation. For API >= 31 can't control splash dark/light theme from app. 
 - Clicking on a tag of a manga will start a search of that tag on the manga section 
 - Show none in year, season inside explore filters 
 - Date picker using wrong date in list editor and airing 

## v2.0.1 
 - Add display scaling to make component small (Settings -> Appearance) [#98](https://github.com/AniLibApp/AniLib/pull/98/files) 
 - fix crash on sorting list entry with null date type 
 - fix crashing app on too many request on app start 
 - fix error when airing filter is immediately applied after login. [#94](https://github.com/AniLibApp/AniLib/issues/94) 
 - fix add many and other in locales to fix crash with plurals 

## v2.0.0 
 * **Complete App Rewrite**: Improved performance and stability with a brand-new codebase. 
 * **Enhanced UI/UX**: Enjoy a more modern and user-friendly interface for a smoother experience. 
 * **Note**: Any missing feature like filter settings will be added later on. ML translate is removed and won't be added. 
 * **Enjoy AniLib!**
